title: Still banned after 14 day suspension
body: My ingame name is RealLifeAus and my suspension was supposed to be lifted on 28/09/2018 but when i try to login i'm still banned.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to either tell you why you are still banned if there is some reason for it, or if it is just an error remove the false suspension.
